transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Many people think the Church is losing followers because it is not accepting of some things. This is true of issues like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Catholic Church has strong views on these issues, but they may be a bit old-fashioned. If the Church changed its views to be more modern, it might keep more followers. 

Many people are turning against the Church because of its views on these issues. They do not agree with the Church's ideas. The Catholic Church is against abortion, so people who support abortion might not want to be part of the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in something and want to do it, but the Church does not agree, you might not want to be part of it.

I also do not see why priests cannot be married or have women priests. The Church says priests are married to God, but I do not see why they cannot have both a job and a family. Everyone else in the world has a job and a family. Priests should be able to have both too. 

Making these changes could help the Church keep its followers.

I do not oppose gay marriage. I think people are born who they are. Some people are gay. I do not think it is a choice. They should not be blamed for how they are.

It seems that people are born gay or straight. I was born straight. I do not think it is fair to blame someone for being gay.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can marry whom. It is not a government issue. It is a personal issue.

I do not think it is right to judge people. The federal government should not be involved in people's personal lives. They should be free to live as they are.

People should not be punished for being gay. They are who they are, and that is not a choice.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. Here's why: 

There's no good reason to stop it. Many people think gay couples harm the traditional family, but that's not true. They are different. There are many reasons to support it. It's like two different sides of the same coin. You can't have heads without tails. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples in many areas, like taxes and healthcare. If you're gay, your partner can't visit you in the hospital or make medical decisions for you. That's not fair. Many studies have shown that gay couples are like straight couples in many ways. They have the same level of happiness and success in their relationships.

The issue is not about getting married in a church, but about getting a marriage certificate from the government. If the government allows a civil union, why not a marriage? It's not fair to say some people can have a marriage and others can't. That's like segregation.

Some people worry about adoption and how gay couples will affect their communities. They also worry about children of gay couples. But these are not good reasons. Children of gay parents can be happy and healthy just like children of straight parents. We need to treat all people equally.

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. The amendment against it is not fair. President Bush has strong views against gay marriage, but they are based on his religion. Morality is different for everyone. We shouldn't ignore the feelings and opinions of other groups in America.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are mentally ill or damaged. But that's not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not just what our friends and neighbors think.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I think some illegal drugs have good qualities. I do not think they should be available to the public. But I think they can be used for medical purposes.

There are many drugs that are illegal, but pharmacies use them. For example, oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. They are controlled substances. We use them because they are helpful. If we do not allow marijuana to be helpful because it is illegal, that makes no sense.

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If you misuse marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you misuse alcohol, that can also cause big problems. It is a difficult issue.

I think we should make marijuana available gradually, not all at once. This way, people will not misuse it. First, we should remove the bad image that people have of marijuana. Many people think it is bad, but it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine.

If people do not think marijuana is bad, they may use it responsibly. And it can be helpful for medical reasons.

The church has changed over the years to be more like the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I always went to church on Sundays. I wore nice dresses, matching shoes and a purse. I went to a private school, and my friends and I would attend church together. But now, the church has made some changes. They have a shorter church service, only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, even during summer. Some people wear beach clothes, and families arrive late. Even at early morning services, people wear jeans and khakis.

These changes are the biggest things I have noticed. I do not know about the church's politics, but these are the things that I see. 

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests regarding pedophilia, I do not think that changing the church rules, such as allowing female priests or married priests, could have prevented these problems. There are married men who have this problem. It is not because they are allowed to get married or not. Being a priest is a choice, and it is a choice that some people make. In some religions, priests can get married, like in the Seventh Heaven faith. If someone wants to get married and practice their faith, they might choose a different faith.

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born with this problem, not because of how they are raised. It is not something that can be changed. The church could not have prevented this problem, unless they knew about it and chose to cover it up. In that case, that would be wrong.

I have a problem with the war in Iraq.  The reason we went to war is still not clear.  People were still hurting from the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction and that he was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said things that were not true. Colin Powell, who was a high government official, now says he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations.

This is a serious problem. It is against the law for a government official to lie to the people. I think the Bush administration does not respect the law and the Constitution.

The administration wanted to go to war. They had a plan to go to war. They wanted to control Iraq's oil. This is not a good reason to go to war.

The war has lasted too long. If we leave now, the country might fall apart. Many people might die. The United Nations and the United States are trying to find a solution. They want a group of countries from the area to help restore order in Iraq.

But this is not a good idea. The country's leaders are not working well together. The government is not effective. People are fighting for control. This is not a good situation.

I do not know what to think. I do not have a simple answer to this problem.

I am talking about the war in Iraq.  At this point, I do not think it is a good idea to stay there.  I think we went to war because we thought Iraq did something bad to us on 9/11.  But we never officially declared war.  We just went there to help them build a democracy.  We also want to get oil from them.  But this is not a good reason to stay.

If we stay, we will try to build democracy, but it will take a long time.  And if we leave, they will be angry with us.  They will have to start over and fix everything we broke.

I do not know much about this topic.  I do not think we should call it a war anymore.  We do not have a good reason to stay.  It is also wasting our money and resources.

I feel bad for President Bush.  He is getting a bad name because of this war.  People are calling it a meaningless war like the Vietnam War.  We should not have started this war.

It is hard to say what I want.  Some of my friends have family members in Iraq.  I do not want them to get hurt.  But if we stay, we will be changing their culture to be like ours.  This will make them angry and make things worse.

I think this war will go on for a long time.  We should try to find a way to stop it.

I do not think it is right for a state to make something legal or illegal based on church rules. The United States Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control church decisions.

In the Constitution, it is written that church and state are separate. I think trying to make a law about this would be against what is already written. If the government tries to make a law, it would be like choosing one church's rules over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this.

It's not up to the government to decide what churches can and cannot say is right or wrong. The separation of church and state is an important part of the Constitution. It helps us have religious freedom in the United States.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it would be bad. It would be against what is already written in the Constitution. Also, it would be one of the few laws that helps the government control people instead of helping keep them free.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The President wants to change the law because he personally does not agree with it. This is not fair because it shows he likes one church over all others.

The churches should decide if something is right or wrong, not the government. There is no good reason for the President to try to change the law. It is just his personal view. I do not see how it would help the country or the economy. In fact, it might even help society more if it were left alone.

The war in Iraq was a difficult issue. I don't think the government was honest with the American people about the reasons for the war. Before the invasion, the government linked the war to the terrorist attacks of September 11th. However, the two events were not closely related.

I am against war in general, especially when it involves a preemptive strike. I think the war in Iraq was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government made the same mistakes in both wars.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. The government removed the Iraqi government without being prepared for the consequences. The US government tried to install a democratic government in Iraq, but it was a difficult task. Democracy takes time to develop, and the US government did not do enough to prepare for the aftermath.

The US government should have known that the war would not be easy. They should have planned for all possible outcomes. The government was not prepared for the void of power in Iraq and the chaos that followed.

The US government should not have gone to war without a clear plan. They should have considered the long-term effects of the war and the number of American casualties. The US government's main reason for invading Iraq was to control the country's oil resources.

I hope the war ends soon and Iraq has peace soon. However, this may not happen.

I am for gay marriage. I have always believed in it. I think it's a personal preference, and it's not something people should be judged for. Many scientists now think that being gay may be partly because of biology, not because of the way we're raised. I think it's unfair to deny people rights because of something they can't control.

Governments should not decide who can get married. It's a personal choice, not a government issue. In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and take care of their homes just like everyone else. I think it's wrong for politicians to decide who can and can't get married.

Some scientists say that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. People may be born that way, like some may be right-handed or left-handed. It's not because of how they were raised or what they learned.

The main problem is that gay people can't get married without being in the news. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately without anyone knowing. But if two gay people want to get married, it's a big public issue. I think marriage should be a personal matter, not something that's decided by the government.

I am against the government telling people who they can and can't marry. It's a private matter, and people should be free to make their own choices.

When you post something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You can't control who sees it. As an R.A., I've dealt with this issue before. If you put something online, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about violence or bad things, people might say something. You can't control what others say.

The internet is public. If your friends see it on MySpace, they will get a bulletin. The school cannot ignore this. They must take it seriously. They can't just let it sit there, or something bad might happen and they could have prevented it.

You don't know what to believe because some people just joke around. But some things can be very serious. In our school situation, someone overheard a student talking and told the school. They looked at the student's Facebook and found some things that could be serious.

When you post things on the internet, your privacy is not safe. If you don't want something out there, don't put it there. You can't control what others think of you. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. But if a student brings it to their attention, they must take it seriously. If there is danger, they have to act.

School officials should not monitor students' phone conversations, texts, or internet chats. But if a student tells them about something, it's different. Teachers should not make fake online accounts to friend their students. I wouldn't friend my residents because I don't want to know about their private lives.

I think the war has lasted too long. 

When it started, the goal was to bring democracy to a country without a fair government. But over time, I do not think this is the main reason we are still fighting. 

Some people might say our original goal was good, but I think our motives were not clear from the beginning. There were problems with the leader of the country, Saddam Hussein, and the U.S. president's father had disagreements with him. 

If the goal was to bring democracy, that would have been a good reason for war. But I do not think it was the main reason. 

I think we made our point when we first started the war. But now the war is lasting for many years. We are not fighting for democracy anymore. We just want to end the war and win.

We are spending a lot of money on the war. This money could be used to solve problems in our own country, like poverty and poor schools. We need to take care of our own problems before helping another country. 

We should end the war and let the other country take care of itself. We have our own problems to solve, and the money we are spending on the war could be used to help our own people. 

This war has gone on for too long. It is time to stop fighting and help our own country.

I have a question.  A life was saved because someone looked at a person's profile on the internet.  This person looked on a website called Myspace.  On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile.  But if you are friends with them, you are giving them permission to see your profile.  So, when you put information on the internet, you know many people will see it.

This is a good thing.  But it is also a problem.  We can't have one person watching all the students' profiles to prevent bad things from happening.  This would be unfair.  We can't have someone's job be to watch what students are doing on the internet.

I have a Facebook account.  I don't like that anyone can see things about me on the internet.  I know there are people who want to hurt others.  They can get information about you from your profile.  They can find out what you look like, where you go to school, and who your friends are.  They can even find out your schedule and where you are during the day.

I try not to put too much information on my Facebook account.  But I also want to be able to talk to my friends.  So, it's a problem.

I heard about a school that banned students from having Myspace accounts.  I don't think the school had the right to do that.  I don't know how they could tell students what to do on the internet.

I am here to talk about the Iraq War. I wish I didn't have to say this. I was against it from the start. But now, people are saying it's not important anymore. I agree. Most people worldwide think it was a bad idea. Even many Americans serving in the military think we should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq was bad before we went there. Now it's worse. There is no easy way to fix the Middle East. The United States and the Middle East have very different cultures. We cannot just bring democracy to a place where people do not want it.

We invaded Iraq because Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But we must consider the consequences. We have to weigh the good and the bad before making important decisions.

I do not think we should stay in Iraq any longer. I have not heard a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly, it may be okay. But I do not see a reason to stay at all.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They think we should be gone within a year. These are the people we are trying to help. Maybe they know better than us. If we ask them what to do, they tell us to leave. Then if things get worse, we can say we tried to help, but they made the decision to leave.

We will never be the good guys in the Middle East, but we can try to do better. I wish we were not in this situation.

I think there is still a problem with gender equality in the United States. This issue affects both men and women, depending on the work they do. Women often face difficulties in the workplace because of a concept called the "glass ceiling." Even with equal qualifications, women may not get promoted because of a long history of men holding positions of power. This is because of how society has been taught to think.

Men also face problems, especially in fields like fashion or being a stay-at-home parent. In these areas, men are often looked down upon because society expects them to work and make money. Stay-at-home dads often struggle because people think it's not normal for men to be at home caring for children.

In the fashion industry, some people may not take men seriously, especially if they are straight. This is because men who like fashion often have different lifestyles than others. If a man is in fashion, people may wonder if he really understands fashion for women.

I believe that changing society's mindset about gender equality is hard. We have made progress, but it is slow. We are making progress as more women become CEOs and get accepted in business. Men are also becoming stay-at-home dads, and people are starting to understand that it's okay.

To change, we need to promote people who are different from what society expects. We should show the good qualities of these people without being pushy. If we try too hard, people will resist. I think we are at a good point right now where people are starting to understand and accept differences.

People from different places or with different backgrounds can also be discriminated against. For example, someone from a farm who wants to become a CEO may be looked down upon because of their grammar. This can happen between genders and within genders.

In conclusion, there are many problems with gender equality in the United States. Changing society takes time, and we are making progress slowly. We need to continue promoting equality and understanding.

My understanding is that they did not make it legal. 
They made it a less serious crime. 
It is no longer a crime that can result in arrest and jailtime. 
Now it is like getting a traffic ticket. 
You get a fine and it does not affect your future in a big way. 
However, some people worry about the future effects of a marijuana charge. 
Even if it is no longer a crime, it can still be a problem. 
But some cities are saying that arresting people for marijuana is expensive. 
It costs money to arrest, try, and jail people. 
So, some cities are deciding not to make it a crime. 
In Denver, people are more open-minded. 
They think it is okay to make marijuana legal. 
This can help the city make more money to spend on important things like schools and programs to help the elderly and the homeless. 
However, some people think that if marijuana were completely legal, it would be a problem. 
More people might smoke it and drive, which is not safe. 
Also, some people still think it is not right to smoke marijuana. 
It is still not acceptable in many places. 
I do not know what to think. 
I think that alcohol can have more serious effects on people. 
But marijuana can still be a problem for some people. 
Everyone reacts differently to substances. 
Some people can use them in a safe way, but others cannot. 
So, it is hard to say what the effects will be. 
I think that both marijuana and alcohol can have serious effects.

I would say yes. 

Here's why. Many things the Catholic Church does are traditional. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to respect tradition. But it is also important to be open to change.

Some Catholics think they have to go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes, the Catholic Church judges people who do not follow the rules exactly. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my mom was an Episcopalian and my dad was also an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. But they could not marry in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion.

This is not being tolerant of other religions. We are taught to love others, which is a Catholic teaching. But it is not fair to say to love others and then not accept them.

I think some parts of Catholic teaching tell you what to do. But the way the Church acts is not always like this. It is too old-fashioned. But the Church still follows it.

I do not think this would make a difference. I think it would be a good idea to allow priests to marry. But I do not think this would stop them from behaving badly with children. It is a different situation.

People who do bad things with children will probably do it anyway. It is not about being married or not. So, I do not think allowing priests to be married would help.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not thought about it deeply. I do not think either side is right or wrong. But I know this is a very difficult topic. It is hard because the separation of church and state and the definition of marriage are closely connected.

I think a civil union is a good idea. It means that two people are together. They should not have to tell the government about their church or God. The government should only care about the fact that they are together.

I also think about same-sex marriage. If two people love each other, they should be able to get a civil union. It does not matter if they are gay or not.

If all the states can come to an agreement, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. It is not important enough. We should not change the constitution for this reason.

I do not think this issue is serious enough to change the constitution. We should just leave it alone.

I grew up in a Christian family. Homosexuality is a complex issue for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Instead, each state should decide for itself.

Many states are democratic or republican. Democratic states are more likely to support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how that state feels about the issue. I do not think you should disagree with the state's decision if it legalizes gay marriage. You chose to live there, so I think you should respect the state's decision.

I already said this, but I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage.

I disagree with President Bush's ban on gay marriage. He cannot decide how every state should be. He lives in one state, but he is not in charge of all states. He will be out of office soon. If a democratic president is elected, they may lift the ban. It would just go back and forth. Each state should decide for itself. They will have to live with the decision, not the president.

No, I do not think we should have a national law requiring all states to allow gay marriage. Each state should be free to make its own decision.

I don't think it's a problem for the school officials to see a student's Myspace page.  Myspace is a public place where people can post things for others to see. If you post something there, it's like saying it out loud in a public place.  School officials can see it, but it's not an invasion of privacy.

If they go on the internet to look for student behavior, that's to make the school a safer place. They might look for things like drinking or smoking. But I think it's okay if they do this to save lives. It's like a responsibility of the school to keep students safe.

Schools can see what students are doing, even if it's not on the school's website. They can see it from home. So, it's not like an invasion of privacy. If they save lives or make the school a better place, I think it's okay.

Many schools have rules and do things to keep students safe. They practice lock downs and drills in case of emergencies, like terrorist attacks. This is like what the school officials did in this case. They wanted to prevent something bad from happening, like a school shooting.

I think it's not a problem for school officials to see a student's Myspace page. They can see it if they want to. It's not an invasion of privacy. They are trying to make the school a safer place.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I supported it because I was affected by the 9/11 attack. I wanted to do something to help. But I think we did not think about the long-term effects. We went to war without a clear plan. I believe this led to problems for us. I now oppose the war. I do not think it helped. As long as the people in that country fight with each other, they cannot fight with us. I do not think our presence there helped.

I stopped caring about the situation there because of the 9/11 attack. I do not think they are human. They fight with each other and cannot work together. I do not care what happens to them.

We went to war without being prepared. We did not know what to expect. War is different for them than for us. They are savage in war. I do not think they want to improve their country. I think they want us to leave. We should leave.

We went to war for revenge. I do not think we thought about the consequences. President Bush wanted to go to war. Many people wanted to go to war because of 9/11. I understand why he made the decision. But I think we could have had a better plan.

We did not have a clear goal. We did not know what to do to create order. There was no unity among the people in charge. I think this made things worse. We created problems in that country because of our emotions. I do not think we can change the people there. I think they will always be the same.

I do not think we are making progress. We made some progress, but it is not enough. I think the country will collapse when we leave. We cannot stay there forever. I think we are hurting ourselves by staying in that country.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Many people think the Church is losing followers because it is not accepting of some things. This is true of issues like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Catholic Church has strong views on these issues, but they may be a bit old-fashioned. If the Church changed its views to be more modern, it might keep more followers. 

Many people are turning against the Church because of its views on these issues. They do not agree with the Church's ideas. The Catholic Church is against abortion, so people who support abortion might not want to be part of the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in something and want to do it, but the Church does not agree, you might not want to be part of it.

I also do not see why priests cannot be married or have women priests. The Church says priests are married to God, but I do not see why they cannot have both a job and a family. Everyone else in the world has a job and a family. Priests should be able to have both too. 

Making these changes could help the Church keep its followers.

I do not oppose gay marriage. I think people are born who they are. Some people are gay. I do not think it is a choice. They should not be blamed for how they are.

It seems that people are born gay or straight. I was born straight. I do not think it is fair to blame someone for being gay.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can marry whom. It is not a government issue. It is a personal issue.

I do not think it is right to judge people. The federal government should not be involved in people's personal lives. They should be free to live as they are.

People should not be punished for being gay. They are who they are, and that is not a choice.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. Here's why: 

There's no good reason to stop it. Many people think gay couples harm the traditional family, but that's not true. They are different. There are many reasons to support it. It's like two different sides of the same coin. You can't have heads without tails. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples in many areas, like taxes and healthcare. If you're gay, your partner can't visit you in the hospital or make medical decisions for you. That's not fair. Many studies have shown that gay couples are like straight couples in many ways. They have the same level of happiness and success in their relationships.

The issue is not about getting married in a church, but about getting a marriage certificate from the government. If the government allows a civil union, why not a marriage? It's not fair to say some people can have a marriage and others can't. That's like segregation.

Some people worry about adoption and how gay couples will affect their communities. They also worry about children of gay couples. But these are not good reasons. Children of gay parents can be happy and healthy just like children of straight parents. We need to treat all people equally.

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. The amendment against it is not fair. President Bush has strong views against gay marriage, but they are based on his religion. Morality is different for everyone. We shouldn't ignore the feelings and opinions of other groups in America.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are mentally ill or damaged. But that's not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not just what our friends and neighbors think.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I think some illegal drugs have good qualities. I do not think they should be available to the public. But I think they can be used for medical purposes.

There are many drugs that are illegal, but pharmacies use them. For example, oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. They are controlled substances. We use them because they are helpful. If we do not allow marijuana to be helpful because it is illegal, that makes no sense.

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If you misuse marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you misuse alcohol, that can also cause big problems. It is a difficult issue.

I think we should make marijuana available gradually, not all at once. This way, people will not misuse it. First, we should remove the bad image that people have of marijuana. Many people think it is bad, but it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine.

If people do not think marijuana is bad, they may use it responsibly. And it can be helpful for medical reasons.

The church has changed over the years to be more like the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I always went to church on Sundays. I wore nice dresses, matching shoes and a purse. I went to a private school, and my friends and I would attend church together. But now, the church has made some changes. They have a shorter church service, only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, even during summer. Some people wear beach clothes, and families arrive late. Even at early morning services, people wear jeans and khakis.

These changes are the biggest things I have noticed. I do not know about the church's politics, but these are the things that I see. 

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests regarding pedophilia, I do not think that changing the church rules, such as allowing female priests or married priests, could have prevented these problems. There are married men who have this problem. It is not because they are allowed to get married or not. Being a priest is a choice, and it is a choice that some people make. In some religions, priests can get married, like in the Seventh Heaven faith. If someone wants to get married and practice their faith, they might choose a different faith.

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born with this problem, not because of how they are raised. It is not something that can be changed. The church could not have prevented this problem, unless they knew about it and chose to cover it up. In that case, that would be wrong.

I have a problem with the war in Iraq.  The reason we went to war is still not clear.  People were still hurting from the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction and that he was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said things that were not true. Colin Powell, who was a high government official, now says he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations.

This is a serious problem. It is against the law for a government official to lie to the people. I think the Bush administration does not respect the law and the Constitution.

The administration wanted to go to war. They had a plan to go to war. They wanted to control Iraq's oil. This is not a good reason to go to war.

The war has lasted too long. If we leave now, the country might fall apart. Many people might die. The United Nations and the United States are trying to find a solution. They want a group of countries from the area to help restore order in Iraq.

But this is not a good idea. The country's leaders are not working well together. The government is not effective. People are fighting for control. This is not a good situation.

I do not know what to think. I do not have a simple answer to this problem.

I am talking about the war in Iraq.  At this point, I do not think it is a good idea to stay there.  I think we went to war because we thought Iraq did something bad to us on 9/11.  But we never officially declared war.  We just went there to help them build a democracy.  We also want to get oil from them.  But this is not a good reason to stay.

If we stay, we will try to build democracy, but it will take a long time.  And if we leave, they will be angry with us.  They will have to start over and fix everything we broke.

I do not know much about this topic.  I do not think we should call it a war anymore.  We do not have a good reason to stay.  It is also wasting our money and resources.

I feel bad for President Bush.  He is getting a bad name because of this war.  People are calling it a meaningless war like the Vietnam War.  We should not have started this war.

It is hard to say what I want.  Some of my friends have family members in Iraq.  I do not want them to get hurt.  But if we stay, we will be changing their culture to be like ours.  This will make them angry and make things worse.

I think this war will go on for a long time.  We should try to find a way to stop it.

I do not think it is right for a state to make something legal or illegal based on church rules. The United States Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control church decisions.

In the Constitution, it is written that church and state are separate. I think trying to make a law about this would be against what is already written. If the government tries to make a law, it would be like choosing one church's rules over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this.

It's not up to the government to decide what churches can and cannot say is right or wrong. The separation of church and state is an important part of the Constitution. It helps us have religious freedom in the United States.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it would be bad. It would be against what is already written in the Constitution. Also, it would be one of the few laws that helps the government control people instead of helping keep them free.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The President wants to change the law because he personally does not agree with it. This is not fair because it shows he likes one church over all others.

The churches should decide if something is right or wrong, not the government. There is no good reason for the President to try to change the law. It is just his personal view. I do not see how it would help the country or the economy. In fact, it might even help society more if it were left alone.

The war in Iraq was a difficult issue. I don't think the government was honest with the American people about the reasons for the war. Before the invasion, the government linked the war to the terrorist attacks of September 11th. However, the two events were not closely related.

I am against war in general, especially when it involves a preemptive strike. I think the war in Iraq was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government made the same mistakes in both wars.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. The government removed the Iraqi government without being prepared for the consequences. The US government tried to install a democratic government in Iraq, but it was a difficult task. Democracy takes time to develop, and the US government did not do enough to prepare for the aftermath.

The US government should have known that the war would not be easy. They should have planned for all possible outcomes. The government was not prepared for the void of power in Iraq and the chaos that followed.

The US government should not have gone to war without a clear plan. They should have considered the long-term effects of the war and the number of American casualties. The US government's main reason for invading Iraq was to control the country's oil resources.

I hope the war ends soon and Iraq has peace soon. However, this may not happen.

I am for gay marriage. I have always believed in it. I think it's a personal preference, and it's not something people should be judged for. Many scientists now think that being gay may be partly because of biology, not because of the way we're raised. I think it's unfair to deny people rights because of something they can't control.

Governments should not decide who can get married. It's a personal choice, not a government issue. In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and take care of their homes just like everyone else. I think it's wrong for politicians to decide who can and can't get married.

Some scientists say that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. People may be born that way, like some may be right-handed or left-handed. It's not because of how they were raised or what they learned.

The main problem is that gay people can't get married without being in the news. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately without anyone knowing. But if two gay people want to get married, it's a big public issue. I think marriage should be a personal matter, not something that's decided by the government.

I am against the government telling people who they can and can't marry. It's a private matter, and people should be free to make their own choices.

When you post something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You can't control who sees it. As an R.A., I've dealt with this issue before. If you put something online, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about violence or bad things, people might say something. You can't control what others say.

The internet is public. If your friends see it on MySpace, they will get a bulletin. The school cannot ignore this. They must take it seriously. They can't just let it sit there, or something bad might happen and they could have prevented it.

You don't know what to believe because some people just joke around. But some things can be very serious. In our school situation, someone overheard a student talking and told the school. They looked at the student's Facebook and found some things that could be serious.

When you post things on the internet, your privacy is not safe. If you don't want something out there, don't put it there. You can't control what others think of you. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. But if a student brings it to their attention, they must take it seriously. If there is danger, they have to act.

School officials should not monitor students' phone conversations, texts, or internet chats. But if a student tells them about something, it's different. Teachers should not make fake online accounts to friend their students. I wouldn't friend my residents because I don't want to know about their private lives.

I think the war has lasted too long. 

When it started, the goal was to bring democracy to a country without a fair government. But over time, I do not think this is the main reason we are still fighting. 

Some people might say our original goal was good, but I think our motives were not clear from the beginning. There were problems with the leader of the country, Saddam Hussein, and the U.S. president's father had disagreements with him. 

If the goal was to bring democracy, that would have been a good reason for war. But I do not think it was the main reason. 

I think we made our point when we first started the war. But now the war is lasting for many years. We are not fighting for democracy anymore. We just want to end the war and win.

We are spending a lot of money on the war. This money could be used to solve problems in our own country, like poverty and poor schools. We need to take care of our own problems before helping another country. 

We should end the war and let the other country take care of itself. We have our own problems to solve, and the money we are spending on the war could be used to help our own people. 

This war has gone on for too long. It is time to stop fighting and help our own country.

I have a question.  A life was saved because someone looked at a person's profile on the internet.  This person looked on a website called Myspace.  On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile.  But if you are friends with them, you are giving them permission to see your profile.  So, when you put information on the internet, you know many people will see it.

This is a good thing.  But it is also a problem.  We can't have one person watching all the students' profiles to prevent bad things from happening.  This would be unfair.  We can't have someone's job be to watch what students are doing on the internet.

I have a Facebook account.  I don't like that anyone can see things about me on the internet.  I know there are people who want to hurt others.  They can get information about you from your profile.  They can find out what you look like, where you go to school, and who your friends are.  They can even find out your schedule and where you are during the day.

I try not to put too much information on my Facebook account.  But I also want to be able to talk to my friends.  So, it's a problem.

I heard about a school that banned students from having Myspace accounts.  I don't think the school had the right to do that.  I don't know how they could tell students what to do on the internet.

I am here to talk about the Iraq War. I wish I didn't have to say this. I was against it from the start. But now, people are saying it's not important anymore. I agree. Most people worldwide think it was a bad idea. Even many Americans serving in the military think we should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq was bad before we went there. Now it's worse. There is no easy way to fix the Middle East. The United States and the Middle East have very different cultures. We cannot just bring democracy to a place where people do not want it.

We invaded Iraq because Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But we must consider the consequences. We have to weigh the good and the bad before making important decisions.

I do not think we should stay in Iraq any longer. I have not heard a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly, it may be okay. But I do not see a reason to stay at all.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They think we should be gone within a year. These are the people we are trying to help. Maybe they know better than us. If we ask them what to do, they tell us to leave. Then if things get worse, we can say we tried to help, but they made the decision to leave.

We will never be the good guys in the Middle East, but we can try to do better. I wish we were not in this situation.

I think there is still a problem with gender equality in the United States. This issue affects both men and women, depending on the work they do. Women often face difficulties in the workplace because of a concept called the "glass ceiling." Even with equal qualifications, women may not get promoted because of a long history of men holding positions of power. This is because of how society has been taught to think.

Men also face problems, especially in fields like fashion or being a stay-at-home parent. In these areas, men are often looked down upon because society expects them to work and make money. Stay-at-home dads often struggle because people think it's not normal for men to be at home caring for children.

In the fashion industry, some people may not take men seriously, especially if they are straight. This is because men who like fashion often have different lifestyles than others. If a man is in fashion, people may wonder if he really understands fashion for women.

I believe that changing society's mindset about gender equality is hard. We have made progress, but it is slow. We are making progress as more women become CEOs and get accepted in business. Men are also becoming stay-at-home dads, and people are starting to understand that it's okay.

To change, we need to promote people who are different from what society expects. We should show the good qualities of these people without being pushy. If we try too hard, people will resist. I think we are at a good point right now where people are starting to understand and accept differences.

People from different places or with different backgrounds can also be discriminated against. For example, someone from a farm who wants to become a CEO may be looked down upon because of their grammar. This can happen between genders and within genders.

In conclusion, there are many problems with gender equality in the United States. Changing society takes time, and we are making progress slowly. We need to continue promoting equality and understanding.

My understanding is that they did not make it legal. 
They made it a less serious crime. 
It is no longer a crime that can result in arrest and jailtime. 
Now it is like getting a traffic ticket. 
You get a fine and it does not affect your future in a big way. 
However, some people worry about the future effects of a marijuana charge. 
Even if it is no longer a crime, it can still be a problem. 
But some cities are saying that arresting people for marijuana is expensive. 
It costs money to arrest, try, and jail people. 
So, some cities are deciding not to make it a crime. 
In Denver, people are more open-minded. 
They think it is okay to make marijuana legal. 
This can help the city make more money to spend on important things like schools and programs to help the elderly and the homeless. 
However, some people think that if marijuana were completely legal, it would be a problem. 
More people might smoke it and drive, which is not safe. 
Also, some people still think it is not right to smoke marijuana. 
It is still not acceptable in many places. 
I do not know what to think. 
I think that alcohol can have more serious effects on people. 
But marijuana can still be a problem for some people. 
Everyone reacts differently to substances. 
Some people can use them in a safe way, but others cannot. 
So, it is hard to say what the effects will be. 
I think that both marijuana and alcohol can have serious effects.

I would say yes. 

Here's why. Many things the Catholic Church does are traditional. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to respect tradition. But it is also important to be open to change.

Some Catholics think they have to go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes, the Catholic Church judges people who do not follow the rules exactly. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my mom was an Episcopalian and my dad was also an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. But they could not marry in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion.

This is not being tolerant of other religions. We are taught to love others, which is a Catholic teaching. But it is not fair to say to love others and then not accept them.

I think some parts of Catholic teaching tell you what to do. But the way the Church acts is not always like this. It is too old-fashioned. But the Church still follows it.

I do not think this would make a difference. I think it would be a good idea to allow priests to marry. But I do not think this would stop them from behaving badly with children. It is a different situation.

People who do bad things with children will probably do it anyway. It is not about being married or not. So, I do not think allowing priests to be married would help.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not thought about it deeply. I do not think either side is right or wrong. But I know this is a very difficult topic. It is hard because the separation of church and state and the definition of marriage are closely connected.

I think a civil union is a good idea. It means that two people are together. They should not have to tell the government about their church or God. The government should only care about the fact that they are together.

I also think about same-sex marriage. If two people love each other, they should be able to get a civil union. It does not matter if they are gay or not.

If all the states can come to an agreement, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. It is not important enough. We should not change the constitution for this reason.

I do not think this issue is serious enough to change the constitution. We should just leave it alone.

I grew up in a Christian family. Homosexuality is a complex issue for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Instead, each state should decide for itself.

Many states are democratic or republican. Democratic states are more likely to support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how that state feels about the issue. I do not think you should disagree with the state's decision if it legalizes gay marriage. You chose to live there, so I think you should respect the state's decision.

I already said this, but I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage.

I disagree with President Bush's ban on gay marriage. He cannot decide how every state should be. He lives in one state, but he is not in charge of all states. He will be out of office soon. If a democratic president is elected, they may lift the ban. It would just go back and forth. Each state should decide for itself. They will have to live with the decision, not the president.

No, I do not think we should have a national law requiring all states to allow gay marriage. Each state should be free to make its own decision.

I don't think it's a problem for the school officials to see a student's Myspace page.  Myspace is a public place where people can post things for others to see. If you post something there, it's like saying it out loud in a public place.  School officials can see it, but it's not an invasion of privacy.

If they go on the internet to look for student behavior, that's to make the school a safer place. They might look for things like drinking or smoking. But I think it's okay if they do this to save lives. It's like a responsibility of the school to keep students safe.

Schools can see what students are doing, even if it's not on the school's website. They can see it from home. So, it's not like an invasion of privacy. If they save lives or make the school a better place, I think it's okay.

Many schools have rules and do things to keep students safe. They practice lock downs and drills in case of emergencies, like terrorist attacks. This is like what the school officials did in this case. They wanted to prevent something bad from happening, like a school shooting.

I think it's not a problem for school officials to see a student's Myspace page. They can see it if they want to. It's not an invasion of privacy. They are trying to make the school a safer place.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I supported it because I was affected by the 9/11 attack. I wanted to do something to help. But I think we did not think about the long-term effects. We went to war without a clear plan. I believe this led to problems for us. I now oppose the war. I do not think it helped. As long as the people in that country fight with each other, they cannot fight with us. I do not think our presence there helped.

I stopped caring about the situation there because of the 9/11 attack. I do not think they are human. They fight with each other and cannot work together. I do not care what happens to them.

We went to war without being prepared. We did not know what to expect. War is different for them than for us. They are savage in war. I do not think they want to improve their country. I think they want us to leave. We should leave.

We went to war for revenge. I do not think we thought about the consequences. President Bush wanted to go to war. Many people wanted to go to war because of 9/11. I understand why he made the decision. But I think we could have had a better plan.

We did not have a clear goal. We did not know what to do to create order. There was no unity among the people in charge. I think this made things worse. We created problems in that country because of our emotions. I do not think we can change the people there. I think they will always be the same.

I do not think we are making progress. We made some progress, but it is not enough. I think the country will collapse when we leave. We cannot stay there forever. I think we are hurting ourselves by staying in that country.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Many people think the Church is losing followers because it is not accepting of some things. This is true of issues like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Catholic Church has strong views on these issues, but they may be a bit old-fashioned. If the Church changed its views to be more modern, it might keep more followers. 

Many people are turning against the Church because of its views on these issues. They do not agree with the Church's ideas. The Catholic Church is against abortion, so people who support abortion might not want to be part of the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in something and want to do it, but the Church does not agree, you might not want to be part of it.

I also do not see why priests cannot be married or have women priests. The Church says priests are married to God, but I do not see why they cannot have both a job and a family. Everyone else in the world has a job and a family. Priests should be able to have both too. 

Making these changes could help the Church keep its followers.

I do not oppose gay marriage. I think people are born who they are. Some people are gay. I do not think it is a choice. They should not be blamed for how they are.

It seems that people are born gay or straight. I was born straight. I do not think it is fair to blame someone for being gay.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can marry whom. It is not a government issue. It is a personal issue.

I do not think it is right to judge people. The federal government should not be involved in people's personal lives. They should be free to live as they are.

People should not be punished for being gay. They are who they are, and that is not a choice.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. Here's why: 

There's no good reason to stop it. Many people think gay couples harm the traditional family, but that's not true. They are different. There are many reasons to support it. It's like two different sides of the same coin. You can't have heads without tails. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples in many areas, like taxes and healthcare. If you're gay, your partner can't visit you in the hospital or make medical decisions for you. That's not fair. Many studies have shown that gay couples are like straight couples in many ways. They have the same level of happiness and success in their relationships.

The issue is not about getting married in a church, but about getting a marriage certificate from the government. If the government allows a civil union, why not a marriage? It's not fair to say some people can have a marriage and others can't. That's like segregation.

Some people worry about adoption and how gay couples will affect their communities. They also worry about children of gay couples. But these are not good reasons. Children of gay parents can be happy and healthy just like children of straight parents. We need to treat all people equally.

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. The amendment against it is not fair. President Bush has strong views against gay marriage, but they are based on his religion. Morality is different for everyone. We shouldn't ignore the feelings and opinions of other groups in America.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are mentally ill or damaged. But that's not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not just what our friends and neighbors think.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I think some illegal drugs have good qualities. I do not think they should be available to the public. But I think they can be used for medical purposes.

There are many drugs that are illegal, but pharmacies use them. For example, oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. They are controlled substances. We use them because they are helpful. If we do not allow marijuana to be helpful because it is illegal, that makes no sense.

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If you misuse marijuana, it can cause problems. But if you misuse alcohol, that can also cause big problems. It is a difficult issue.

I think we should make marijuana available gradually, not all at once. This way, people will not misuse it. First, we should remove the bad image that people have of marijuana. Many people think it is bad, but it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine.

If people do not think marijuana is bad, they may use it responsibly. And it can be helpful for medical reasons.

The church has changed over the years to be more like the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I always went to church on Sundays. I wore nice dresses, matching shoes and a purse. I went to a private school, and my friends and I would attend church together. But now, the church has made some changes. They have a shorter church service, only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, even during summer. Some people wear beach clothes, and families arrive late. Even at early morning services, people wear jeans and khakis.

These changes are the biggest things I have noticed. I do not know about the church's politics, but these are the things that I see. 

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests regarding pedophilia, I do not think that changing the church rules, such as allowing female priests or married priests, could have prevented these problems. There are married men who have this problem. It is not because they are allowed to get married or not. Being a priest is a choice, and it is a choice that some people make. In some religions, priests can get married, like in the Seventh Heaven faith. If someone wants to get married and practice their faith, they might choose a different faith.

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born with this problem, not because of how they are raised. It is not something that can be changed. The church could not have prevented this problem, unless they knew about it and chose to cover it up. In that case, that would be wrong.

I have a problem with the war in Iraq.  The reason we went to war is still not clear.  People were still hurting from the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction and that he was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said things that were not true. Colin Powell, who was a high government official, now says he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations.

This is a serious problem. It is against the law for a government official to lie to the people. I think the Bush administration does not respect the law and the Constitution.

The administration wanted to go to war. They had a plan to go to war. They wanted to control Iraq's oil. This is not a good reason to go to war.

The war has lasted too long. If we leave now, the country might fall apart. Many people might die. The United Nations and the United States are trying to find a solution. They want a group of countries from the area to help restore order in Iraq.

But this is not a good idea. The country's leaders are not working well together. The government is not effective. People are fighting for control. This is not a good situation.

I do not know what to think. I do not have a simple answer to this problem.

I am talking about the war in Iraq.  At this point, I do not think it is a good idea to stay there.  I think we went to war because we thought Iraq did something bad to us on 9/11.  But we never officially declared war.  We just went there to help them build a democracy.  We also want to get oil from them.  But this is not a good reason to stay.

If we stay, we will try to build democracy, but it will take a long time.  And if we leave, they will be angry with us.  They will have to start over and fix everything we broke.

I do not know much about this topic.  I do not think we should call it a war anymore.  We do not have a good reason to stay.  It is also wasting our money and resources.

I feel bad for President Bush.  He is getting a bad name because of this war.  People are calling it a meaningless war like the Vietnam War.  We should not have started this war.

It is hard to say what I want.  Some of my friends have family members in Iraq.  I do not want them to get hurt.  But if we stay, we will be changing their culture to be like ours.  This will make them angry and make things worse.

I think this war will go on for a long time.  We should try to find a way to stop it.

I do not think it is right for a state to make something legal or illegal based on church rules. The United States Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control church decisions.

In the Constitution, it is written that church and state are separate. I think trying to make a law about this would be against what is already written. If the government tries to make a law, it would be like choosing one church's rules over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this.

It's not up to the government to decide what churches can and cannot say is right or wrong. The separation of church and state is an important part of the Constitution. It helps us have religious freedom in the United States.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it would be bad. It would be against what is already written in the Constitution. Also, it would be one of the few laws that helps the government control people instead of helping keep them free.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The President wants to change the law because he personally does not agree with it. This is not fair because it shows he likes one church over all others.

The churches should decide if something is right or wrong, not the government. There is no good reason for the President to try to change the law. It is just his personal view. I do not see how it would help the country or the economy. In fact, it might even help society more if it were left alone.

The war in Iraq was a difficult issue. I don't think the government was honest with the American people about the reasons for the war. Before the invasion, the government linked the war to the terrorist attacks of September 11th. However, the two events were not closely related.

I am against war in general, especially when it involves a preemptive strike. I think the war in Iraq was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government made the same mistakes in both wars.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. The government removed the Iraqi government without being prepared for the consequences. The US government tried to install a democratic government in Iraq, but it was a difficult task. Democracy takes time to develop, and the US government did not do enough to prepare for the aftermath.

The US government should have known that the war would not be easy. They should have planned for all possible outcomes. The government was not prepared for the void of power in Iraq and the chaos that followed.

The US government should not have gone to war without a clear plan. They should have considered the long-term effects of the war and the number of American casualties. The US government's main reason for invading Iraq was to control the country's oil resources.

I hope the war ends soon and Iraq has peace soon. However, this may not happen.

I am for gay marriage. I have always believed in it. I think it's a personal preference, and it's not something people should be judged for. Many scientists now think that being gay may be partly because of biology, not because of the way we're raised. I think it's unfair to deny people rights because of something they can't control.

Governments should not decide who can get married. It's a personal choice, not a government issue. In my neighborhood, there are openly gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and take care of their homes just like everyone else. I think it's wrong for politicians to decide who can and can't get married.

Some scientists say that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. People may be born that way, like some may be right-handed or left-handed. It's not because of how they were raised or what they learned.

The main problem is that gay people can't get married without being in the news. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately without anyone knowing. But if two gay people want to get married, it's a big public issue. I think marriage should be a personal matter, not something that's decided by the government.

I am against the government telling people who they can and can't marry. It's a private matter, and people should be free to make their own choices.

When you post something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You can't control who sees it. As an R.A., I've dealt with this issue before. If you put something online, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about violence or bad things, people might say something. You can't control what others say.

The internet is public. If your friends see it on MySpace, they will get a bulletin. The school cannot ignore this. They must take it seriously. They can't just let it sit there, or something bad might happen and they could have prevented it.

You don't know what to believe because some people just joke around. But some things can be very serious. In our school situation, someone overheard a student talking and told the school. They looked at the student's Facebook and found some things that could be serious.

When you post things on the internet, your privacy is not safe. If you don't want something out there, don't put it there. You can't control what others think of you. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. But if a student brings it to their attention, they must take it seriously. If there is danger, they have to act.

School officials should not monitor students' phone conversations, texts, or internet chats. But if a student tells them about something, it's different. Teachers should not make fake online accounts to friend their students. I wouldn't friend my residents because I don't want to know about their private lives.

I think the war has lasted too long. 

When it started, the goal was to bring democracy to a country without a fair government. But over time, I do not think this is the main reason we are still fighting. 

Some people might say our original goal was good, but I think our motives were not clear from the beginning. There were problems with the leader of the country, Saddam Hussein, and the U.S. president's father had disagreements with him. 

If the goal was to bring democracy, that would have been a good reason for war. But I do not think it was the main reason. 

I think we made our point when we first started the war. But now the war is lasting for many years. We are not fighting for democracy anymore. We just want to end the war and win.

We are spending a lot of money on the war. This money could be used to solve problems in our own country, like poverty and poor schools. We need to take care of our own problems before helping another country. 

We should end the war and let the other country take care of itself. We have our own problems to solve, and the money we are spending on the war could be used to help our own people. 

This war has gone on for too long. It is time to stop fighting and help our own country.

I have a question.  A life was saved because someone looked at a person's profile on the internet.  This person looked on a website called Myspace.  On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile.  But if you are friends with them, you are giving them permission to see your profile.  So, when you put information on the internet, you know many people will see it.

This is a good thing.  But it is also a problem.  We can't have one person watching all the students' profiles to prevent bad things from happening.  This would be unfair.  We can't have someone's job be to watch what students are doing on the internet.

I have a Facebook account.  I don't like that anyone can see things about me on the internet.  I know there are people who want to hurt others.  They can get information about you from your profile.  They can find out what you look like, where you go to school, and who your friends are.  They can even find out your schedule and where you are during the day.

I try not to put too much information on my Facebook account.  But I also want to be able to talk to my friends.  So, it's a problem.

I heard about a school that banned students from having Myspace accounts.  I don't think the school had the right to do that.  I don't know how they could tell students what to do on the internet.

I am here to talk about the Iraq War. I wish I didn't have to say this. I was against it from the start. But now, people are saying it's not important anymore. I agree. Most people worldwide think it was a bad idea. Even many Americans serving in the military think we should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq was bad before we went there. Now it's worse. There is no easy way to fix the Middle East. The United States and the Middle East have very different cultures. We cannot just bring democracy to a place where people do not want it.

We invaded Iraq because Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But we must consider the consequences. We have to weigh the good and the bad before making important decisions.

I do not think we should stay in Iraq any longer. I have not heard a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly, it may be okay. But I do not see a reason to stay at all.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They think we should be gone within a year. These are the people we are trying to help. Maybe they know better than us. If we ask them what to do, they tell us to leave. Then if things get worse, we can say we tried to help, but they made the decision to leave.

We will never be the good guys in the Middle East, but we can try to do better. I wish we were not in this situation.

I think there is still a problem with gender equality in the United States. This issue affects both men and women, depending on the work they do. Women often face difficulties in the workplace because of a concept called the "glass ceiling." Even with equal qualifications, women may not get promoted because of a long history of men holding positions of power. This is because of how society has been taught to think.

Men also face problems, especially in fields like fashion or being a stay-at-home parent. In these areas, men are often looked down upon because society expects them to work and make money. Stay-at-home dads often struggle because people think it's not normal for men to be at home caring for children.

In the fashion industry, some people may not take men seriously, especially if they are straight. This is because men who like fashion often have different lifestyles than others. If a man is in fashion, people may wonder if he really understands fashion for women.

I believe that changing society's mindset about gender equality is hard. We have made progress, but it is slow. We are making progress as more women become CEOs and get accepted in business. Men are also becoming stay-at-home dads, and people are starting to understand that it's okay.

To change, we need to promote people who are different from what society expects. We should show the good qualities of these people without being pushy. If we try too hard, people will resist. I think we are at a good point right now where people are starting to understand and accept differences.

People from different places or with different backgrounds can also be discriminated against. For example, someone from a farm who wants to become a CEO may be looked down upon because of their grammar. This can happen between genders and within genders.

In conclusion, there are many problems with gender equality in the United States. Changing society takes time, and we are making progress slowly. We need to continue promoting equality and understanding.
